/* WorkHistoryRepository.ListWorkHistory */
SELECT H.WORK_HISTORY_ID, C.COMPANY_ID, C.CORPORATE_NAME, C.COMPANY_NAME, H.RANK_CODE, H.JOB_TITLE_CODE, H.ANNUAL_TYPE_CODE, H.JOIN_YMD, H.QUIT_YMD, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, H.JOIN_YMD, IFNULL(H.QUIT_YMD, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())) AS WORK_DIFF_Y, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, H.JOIN_YMD, IFNULL(H.QUIT_YMD, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())) % 12 AS WORK_DIFF_M, ( SELECT SUM(FN_GET_VACATION_USE_COUNT(V.VACATION_START_YMD, V.VACATION_END_YMD)) FROM HM_VACATION V WHERE V.WORK_HISTORY_ID = H.WORK_HISTORY_ID AND V.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND V.VACATION_TYPE_CODE NOT IN ('07', '08', '09', '10', '11') ) AS VACATION_USE_COUNT FROM HM_WORK_HISTORY H INNER JOIN HM_COMPANY C ON C.COMPANY_ID = H.COMPANY_ID WHERE H.EMPLOYEE_ID = @EmployeeId AND H.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY H.JOIN_YMD DESC

/* WorkHistoryRepository.GetWorkHistory */
SELECT H.WORK_HISTORY_ID, C.COMPANY_ID, C.CORPORATE_NAME, C.COMPANY_NAME, H.RANK_CODE, H.JOB_TITLE_CODE, H.ANNUAL_TYPE_CODE, H.JOIN_YMD, H.QUIT_YMD FROM HM_WORK_HISTORY H INNER JOIN HM_COMPANY C ON C.COMPANY_ID = H.COMPANY_ID WHERE 1=1
AND H.WORK_HISTORY_ID = @WorkHistoryId
AND H.EMPLOYEE_ID = @EmployeeId
AND C.COMPANY_ID = @CompanyId

/* WorkHistoryRepository.UpdateWorkHistory */
UPDATE HM_WORK_HISTORY SET
RANK_CODE = @RankCode,
JOB_TITLE_CODE = @JobTitleCode,
ANNUAL_TYPE_CODE = @AnnualTypeCode,
JOIN_YMD = @JoinYmd,
QUIT_YMD = @QuitYmd, UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE WORK_HISTORY_ID = @WorkHistoryId

/* WorkHistoryRepository.RemoveWorkHistory */
UPDATE HM_WORK_HISTORY SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE WORK_HISTORY_ID = @WorkHistoryId
